long_description: McNett Aquaseal is a urethane rubber compound that provides flexible repair for wetsuits, dry suits or any neoprene item. McNett Aquaseal repairs are flexible, stretchable and foldable. Fuses small holes, tears or seams. Can be applied to knees, elbows and other areas on clothing that are prone to wear and tear, as a preventative measure. For use on neoprene, nylon, GORE-TEX(R) fabric, Nypalon(R), urethane, rubber and more. Dries clear. Accelerate cure time with Cotol-240(TM) Cure Accelerator, sold separately.
short_description: McNett Aquaseal is a urethane rubber compound that provides flexible repair for wetsuits, dry suits or any neoprene item.
